patterns: what are the courses offered in mrcet

responses: The College offers Engineering courses (B.Tech.) in AE, CSE, CSE(AI&ML), CSE(CS), CSE(IOT), CSE(DS), AI&ML, AI&DS, ECE, EEE, IT, MECH disciplines and Post Graduate (M.Tech.) courses in ECE, CSE, MECH and AE specializations in addition to MBA programmes.
